bug.author: dfalbel
bug.summary: add to a integer tensor fails
bug.description: <denchmark-code>> torch_tensor(1L) + 1L Error in (function (self, other, alpha) : For integral input tensors, argument alpha must not be a floating point number. (alpha_check at ../aten/src/ATen/native/BinaryOps.h:14) </denchmark-code>
